website_summaries.verdict: A fashionable polo shirt that can be worn casually or even to work for most men, available in many designs.
pros: Available in different colors and patterns, ensuring that any sense of style can be accommodated
Can be worn tucked in or untucked and still looks fashionable
Washes and dries well, holding its quality, color, and shape

customer_reviews.title: Not real thin material- Made for guys with beer bellies
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are one size larger than I typically wear, and fit perfect over my beer belly. Since the material is not thin, your belly bulge is kind of hidden. Stick with dark colors. Delivery was super fast. I had a couple of these shirts for at least 6-months, and they launder with no wrinkles and are colorfast. Thank you Van Heusen & Thank you Overstock.com for placing these on Amazon. Great delivery speed Amazon with free shipping and 2-days after order, they were on my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and holds new look
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these style and brand of shirts for a few years and like them. I like how the collars keep their shape and don't get floppy or unevenly creased like many shirt collars will do. I have some of these shirts that are probably 6 years old but they don't look old or faded.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, quality shirt, but will be too long on any male about 5'8" and under
customer_reviews.text: I got this shirt for my husband. He wears a small or medium in shirts, and this was supposed to be a medium that ran small, so we thought it would be a good fit for him. Overall, it is--it fits nice in the shoulders and across the chest. But unfortunately, it is WAY too long, coming down past his hips. My husband is on the shorter side for a man (5'6"), but the average male height is not 6"--why don't manufacturers take this into consideration? It's a shame because this shirt is a nice quality and attractive otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Dr. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, well sewn, attractive color, launders well
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great shirt! The color is subtle and classy, and goes with pretty much any color pants. It's great with jeans, khakis, and even black. Not to mention all those wild colors like grass green, red, orange. (Well, people in Europe dress like that, and it looks great!) The fabric is soft and substantial but not heavy. It launders well. The fit is what I would consider normal, not super slim but not cut for someone overweight or very muscular for their height. Maybe that is why some reviewers found the sleeves too short?

customer_reviews.title: A nice bussiness casual shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Fit as expected. 2. Material was soft and felt nice - easy to wear all day. 3. Did not shrink or get crazy after a few washes and machine drying. 4. Did not require ironing after drying. 5. Would purchase again. 6. Would work well in bussiness casual environment. Cons: 1. Pattern is a little boring but works well none-the-less.

customer_reviews.title: Wash, dry..wear :)
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this for a good look and easy care! The shirt fabric is soft to start with and not flimsy or too weighty for summer .Looks great with jeans or slacks and this color is gorgeous shade of bluey/gray. The windowpane design is actually very fine lines of black/faint white. Two button opening to pull over head with the pretty much lie down collar. Can look dressy or very nicely done casual.
customer_reviews.author: lizardwitch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't shrink, wrinkle, or fade!
customer_reviews.text: We picked up this brand of shirt a couple summers ago, at Sam's Club, for my husband to wear to work. His dress code is business casual, and these shirts are perfect. Of all the polo/dress shirts we've purchased for him, that Sam's Club shirt held up the best. It didn't wrinkle, it didn't shrink, and the color didn't fade. We searched Amazon to see if we could find more...and we did! We purchased 4 more in different colors. This is now the only work shirts he'll wear. I'm certain we'll be ordering more soon. Highly recommended for ease of care.
customer_reviews.author: BridgettTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, comfortable shirt
customer_reviews.text: Van Heusen's polo style shirt is comfortable and fits well, with a well-matched windowpane pattern and a look that's well suited for casual wear or an informal office setting. Nice looking shirt in a more traditional look. Washes up nicely with no wrinkles after minimal drying.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive men’s shirt
customer_reviews.text: Van Heusen shirts are known for their good quality men’s shirts. This shirt is well-made and looks handsome on. However, it does run a little small. If you are in doubt, buy one size up on this style. Usually, the VH brand is true to size. This is a good shirt for a man/father/grandfather. Not really a style for younger men.
